document.full_text: president barack obama on tuesday urged euro zone countries and bondholders to make tough decisions to contain greece's debt crisis while the international monetary fund said more work was needed for athens to receive its next block of bailout aid.
document.title: obama urges tough decisions on greek debt crisis
lines_and_colors: president barack obama on tuesday urged euro zone countries and bondholders to make tough decisions to contain greece's debt crisis while the international monetary fund said more work was needed for athens to receive its next block of bailout aid.
